scripts.test: cd server && set NODE_ENV=test && npm run drop-tables && npm run migrate && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcov mocha --require babel-register test/ --exit
scripts.start: cd server && babel-node index.js --exec babel-node --presets es2015
scripts.dev: cd server && nodemon index.js --exec babel-node babel-node --presets es2015
scripts.migrate: cd server && babel-node database/tables.js --exec babel-node --presets es2015
scripts.drop-tables: cd server && babel-node database/dropTables.js --exec babel-node --presets es2015
